<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ghost Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3008)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A wizard who died with work incomplete might become a ghost mage.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 27

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ghost_Mage.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Ghost Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3008)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghost" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=753" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=632" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=737" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 161 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +6

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Site Bound** 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +22 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 135
(rejuvenation, [void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), precision, unconscious

**Resistances**
all damage 10 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840), [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737), or [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579)) Completing the ghost mage's project allows it to move on to the afterlife.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ghostly hand +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+12 void

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 29, attack +23
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Figment](/Spells.aspx?ID=1528), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715)
- **1st**
[Enfeeble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1513) (×2)
- **2nd**
[Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (×2)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Veil of Privacy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739)
- **4th**
[Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315), [Vision of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=1742)
- **5th**
[Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [Howling Blizzard](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559)

**Frightful Moan** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) DC 29

**Telekinetic Assault** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) 6d6 bludgeoning, DC 29

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Building Ghosts</title>

Note that the ghost mage is built from the ground up, rather than by applying the ghost rules to a once-living creature, so its numbers don't exactly match the values listed under Creating a Ghost. This is usually the better way to go if you have the time, as it allows you to hand-craft a ghost for the situation.
</aside>
